sections.heading: Act, how interpreted.Sections 77-3301 to 77-3316 shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them
77-3301 to 77-3316 shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them
